attributes.action: Give all NHS staff a pay rise
attributes.additional_details: With the cost of living crisis to name one of the various problems in the current climate we need to help all staff in the NHS because without NHS there’s no healthcare for the public
attributes.background: The government needs to act to give ALL NHS staff a pay rise.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ensure All National Health Staff receive a minimum 7.5% pay increase: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630102
